column4: Could someone tell me how to change Samba passwd? When I accesss wondows n/w, a pop-up asks for my log-in and pw, for which both my ubuntu user and root fields dont seem to work
why would your ubuntu password work on your windoze box?
I have edited samba conf file, but still.. what should I enter as username and pw?
whatever you would normally log into your windoze computer
